text: Matteo Ricci (born 18 July 1974 in Pesaro) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he served as President of the Province of Pesaro and Urbino from 2009 to 2014. He was elected Mayor of Pesaro on 25 May 2014 and took office on 30 May. He has been re-elected for a second term in 2019. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *2019 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Pesaro ==External links== * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Pesaro Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians Category:Presidents of the Province of Pesaro and Urbino
title: Matteo Ricci (politician)
